nodes.text: The Corellia Star captain was the pilot of the YT-1300 light freighter Corellia Star during the Galactic Civil War. He was killed by Imperial forces while trying to deliver information on the TIE Phantom project to the Alliance to Restore the Republic.
The Corellia Star captain only appeared in the LucasArts video game Star Wars: Rebel Assault II: The Hidden Empire. He was portrayed in the game by Marc Bauman and is credited as "Cargo Captain."
